name: Sweets Defence
description:
A fun and challenging strategy game, that will make you think hard for a win.

Sweets Defence is a free to play game!

If you like challenges and a game that will make you scratch your head then this is the right game for you. 

Sweets Defence is a unique game that focuses primarily on strategy. 

The game contains monthly challenges that will get updated each month and a few persistent levels that will challenge your wits. 

The game is a tower defence type of game developed by "DrolDevs". 

Unlike most free to play game, Sweets defence does not bombard players with ads. It is the company's philosophy to provide an enjoyable environment for people to play a game, without disturbing ads or distractions.
